name: @veraxhq/verax
description: Public Flow Sanity Guard â€” Trust-Locked, Deterministic, CI-Safe.

scripts.clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const dirs = ['.verax', 'tmp'].map(d => path.join(__dirname, d)); dirs.forEach(dir => { if (fs.existsSync(dir)) { fs.rmSync(dir, { recursive: true, force: true }); console.log('Cleaned:', dir); } });"
scripts.verax:demo: cross-env VERAX_FIXTURE_DIR=./demos/hello-verax VERAX_FIXTURE_PORT=4000 node bin/verax.js run --url http://127.0.0.1:4000 --src demos/hello-verax --out .verax/demo --min-coverage 0.6
scripts.postpack: node -e "if (process.env.VERAX_SKIP_POSTPACK_CLEANUP !== '1') { const fs = require('fs'); const glob = require('glob'); glob.sync('*.tgz').forEach(f => { fs.unlinkSync(f); console.log('Auto-removed pack artifact:', f); }); } else { console.log('Postpack cleanup skipped (test mode)'); }"
